headline.main: Lack of Exercise Cited in U.S. Women

docs.lead_paragraph: Almost three-quarters of women still are not getting enough exercise, Federal health officials have said. Seventy-three percent of women age 18 and older do not get the recommended amount of exercise, either the 20 minutes of heavy-breathing aerobic activity three days a week or the less strenuous 30-minute sessions at least five days a week, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said.
